title: FPS drops after 4.21
body:
Hi,

like many people here or in other servers, I am having serious fps drops after 4.21. I used to play perfectly at more than 120fps (120/144hz monitor, GTX 660), but after patch 4.21 I am getting constant fps drops in every game. I see some people say it's Lucian's Q. I believe it may be related to VFX, however I don't think it's just Lucian. Every few seconds the game hitches and the fps drop to around 15-30. It makes the game totally unplayable and not fun. I stopped playing ranked games as soon as it started, and now I have to stop playing normal games because it is unbearable. 

I tried to link some other threads for different forums / different servers to note that it's a widespread issue, but my post did not go in, so I will not post those now.

I have tried updating Nvidia drivers, cleaning processes running, and re-patching the game (verifying files through client.) Nothing has solved it so far. 
I do not use lolreplay or similar.

This is a blocking issue. Can't play till fixed.

Thanks,
rsam.

replies.body:
I'm having the same problem with my AMD A8 laptop. I was getting up to 90 FPS after getting the Omega drivers, then this patch came, and now I can only get between 30-55, and that's after having to lower my graphic settings. I can't play at the settings I use to, and now I can't stream the game.

Why hasn't Riot said anything on this problem? Always breaking something, damned savages. {{champion:25}}

I'm having the same issue. Avg fps of 60, but randomly drops to 5-9 fps, usually right during a teamfight, though not during all teamfights. When it drops, it stays stupid low for SEVERAL minutes, making the game unplayable until it comes back up. But then I have to hope it wont do it again during the next team fight....

They need to address this issue because it's a major bug that even affects higher end PC's. I didn't pay good money on this game just for 4.21 to come out and ruin everything. It's obvious it's a big issue because i've read hundreds of complaints from random sites about FPS drops and lag. If they don't fix the problem I will focus primarily on DotA 2 because I can run that game at max no problem. The optimization Riot promised was not true.
750 gtm i get 5fps after new patch 4.21
Thanks all for reporting too. I hope Riot sees that it's a widespread problem and that it is not related to a specific configuration or pc, and they can find what it's causing it.

AMD A10-5750
DDR III 8GB; 1TB (SATA) 7200rpm
15.6-inch Full HD Non Reflection
ATI Neptune XT R9-M290X 2GB GDDR5

My fps keeps dropping when I go to lane and I set everything on "very low". FPS drops all the way to 15-30 from 60+

I was getting up to 90 FPS before this crap started happening. I have an A8-5545M, but my FPS stays around 30-55 on 1080p, at every level of quality, which is a bearable frame rate, but I can't stream as I could before. It doesn't make sense why I'm still getting higher FPS than your A10, and many other higher end CPU's and GPU's.
I honestly feel like this is a big enough problem that the patch should be rolled back. It's ridiculous that there's no official word on this or even an admission that there's a problem.

Also having the same problem, I also have a gtx 660 with six core cpu and a 120hz monitor. I used to cap the fps out to 120 just because it syncs well with the 120 hz monitor. Since 4.21 though I go from 120fps down to 30 for some odd reason. Before 4.21 my fps never dropped from 120. If I took the fps cap off it would stay around 250 and maybe drop to 220. Its not just lucians Q, there is something more to it and I hope they can fix it.

I have 2 GTX 760;s in SLI and I am too getting FPs Drops My game runs anywhere between 200- 500 fps and sometimes it drops to 50 or 40 I dont understand why esp because I have a i7 4770k and a SSD as well as two 760's

I'm having the same issue.  I was playing great earlier today, and I took a 10 minute break and when I came back the game started getting blocked by an imaginary firewall that I didn't have.  And when I fixed that issue, I got into the game and my FPS was down from a steady 50-60 to 14-30.

I don't know what caused this, but I'm not going to start playing anything but bots until either the issue is resolved or I figure out whats wrong.

Very common now:
http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2p62tj/fps_drops_421/

Hey rsam,

If you haven't already, please check you're not forcing any settings on in the Nvidia Control Panel. Most importantly Anti Aliasing or Anisotropic Filtering - check that these are off or application controlled.

They are off. It would be weird that it were a setting, since it was playing perfectly before the patch was applied. Many people are going through the same with different cards, nvidia and ati alike.

A search on Google reveals many people with the exact same issue, some of them in the forums of different servers, but also blaming the patch 4.21.
https://www.google.com/search?q=fps+drops+league+of+legends+4.21


Thanks.

The community should stop playing the game until this issue is fixed. 
That would most likely get this issue noticed and mended.

AMD A10-5750
DDR III 8GB; 1TB (SATA) 7200rpm
15.6-inch Full HD Non Reflection
ATI Neptune XT R9-M290X 2GB GDDR5


Fps drops from 80 to 15-30 on "very low" settings.

Even though I have a shitty toaster laptop, I can tell how badly the patch screwed me. I might get pretty low in teamfights, like 13-20 fps, but this patch just shatters that. I'm talking single digits. Like 5. 5 frames per second. I even get 15-20 when I'm not even fighting. It's so bad that I don't even want to play anymore.

I have same problem i have  Sapphire hd 7750 graphics card and AMD FX 4130 quad core processor and fps drops from 140 fps to like 40 in teamfights sometimes, realy and realy anoying.  This drops are sometimes unplayeble. Yesterday I download  because of this unplayeble drops dota 2 and play so smoothly on max settings! Repair this riot .......

At this moment I have tried:
* Repair from launcher
* Rename game.cfg to reset settings
* Update nvidia drivers
* Close all other processes
* Restart computer

Nothing has fixed it so far.

riot you are losing me sooo many ranked games wtf are you going to do about this?
ITS FUCKING SEASON 5 ALREADY!
YOU EVEN SAID: "we updated the spalsh and colors to SR2 and have looked into the feedback and confirmed that lower end computers should still run SR2 smoothly" 
U RIOT ARE A FUCKING LIAR
went from 95 fps to 20-35 and even worse when im attacking

Really Riot? This FPS issue was known as one of the biggest issue long time ago (google for proofs). And even with "middle-end" computers cant run the game smoothly. My "middle-end" laptop can play GTA IV and DotA2 with no problems but always have FPS drops with LoL and only LoL. Tried all FPS boost tips on the internet...

Riot, please just spend some time fixing these wellknown bugs/errors instead of trying to balance a not balance-able game. Youre not balancing the game, youre just rotating the hot-pick/ban champions LOL. One rises and one sinks. When Ashe gets hot, Lucian will be forgot, and rotate.Learn from DotA2 please, almost every hero works in competitive.

I once had a hope when you guys introduced SR2 as a map with better view but less system requirements. And now its getting worse.

I reset my Nvidia graphics card's settings to default (which in theory isn't as optimal as how I have set them up) and everything is running much smoother. I was completely wrong for getting upset with Riot, but in all honesty I've spent hours reading about Nvidia cards and how to optimize them so I didn't think for a second it could be my card. I'm assuming there may be a conflict between one of my settings and the client as LoL was the only game I received FPS issues with. I also altered the Game.cfg file, which increased my FPS by quite a bit as well.

Just go through the steps on the trouble shoot. I do everything on the list regularly, but** resetting my graphics card's settings to default was the only thing that fixed my issue**. And I've been trying tons of stuff for days. If you manually altered your video card, just default it and it should be fine.
Nah, thousands of people out there got same problem, its not your card, its riot and their new map. Idk why you luckily fixed yours, but this method didnt work with my NVIDIA 640M. :(

Me too. And they said SR2 would look nicer but still is smoother.... 

Ive switched to DotA2 for 2 weeks because of this fps drop. It's not only from 4.21 only, I have noticed this one and a half months ago....

Just out of curiosity I went on Youtube and looked up a few videos of professional streamers, and I found that their FPS rates were much lower after the 4.21 patch. Ie, Meteo's stream sometimes goes into the 60 FPS range after 4.21, but a few weeks ago he was streaming at over 120 FPS. That's not a small drop in FPS.

> [{quoted}](name=CounterSnipe,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ilGxpfUf,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2015-01-07T07:31:33.078+0000)
>
> Just out of curiosity I went on Youtube and looked up a few videos of professional streamers, and I found that their FPS rates were much lower after the 4.21 patch. Ie, Meteo's stream sometimes goes into the 60 FPS range after 4.21, but a few weeks ago he was streaming at over 120 FPS. That's not a small drop in FPS.

If he uses vsync/capped frames, it could be the difference between 121 and 119 fps.

Guys, have you tried this?
http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2pby1w/possible_fps_fix_patch_421/
I tried it, it had no effect. I don't see why it would.

> [{quoted}](name=BamBamxxxx,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ilGxpfUf,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2015-01-03T21:27:36.658+0000)
>
> I tried it, it had no effect. I don't see why it would.

I don't know if it was that, but I came back after 2 weeks without playing, changed that and haven't had issues anymore. Could have been something else like a Windows update, antivirus or something. Actually, I think the lol also patched some files? I am not having the drops anymore. Is everyone here still affected by it?
Same for me, Mine will drop to 10-20 fps. Hopefully this problem will be addressed in patch 4.22
